title: WTT for T3 Turkey Reds--tradelist attached

posts.post_title: WTT for T3 Turkey Reds--tradelist attached
posts.post_content:
Hello everyone,

Just wanted to put it out here that I am looking for Turkey Reds either raw or graded. Condition would be in range of poor to vg and back damage or writing is okay. Willing to trade what I have in the link below. Please contact me at [URL="andrewhahn55@gmail.com"]andrewhahn55@gmail.com[/URL]
Cards for trade in the link

Just wanted to thank everyone who has reached out to make trades. I managed to pick up 7 more cards by trading.

Thanks, Andrew
